channel.title: The Moth Podcast
channel.description: Since its launch in 1997, The Moth has presented thousands of true stories, told live and without notes, to standing-room-only crowds worldwide. Moth storytellers stand alone, under a spotlight, with only a microphone and a roomful of strangers. The storyteller and the audience embark on a high-wire act of shared experience which is both terrifying and exhilarating. Since 2008, The Moth podcast has featured many of our favorite stories told live on Moth stages around the country. For information on all of our programs and live events, visit themoth.org.
channel.itunes:summary: Since its launch in 1997, The Moth has presented thousands of true stories, told live and without notes, to standing-room-only crowds worldwide. Moth storytellers stand alone, under a spotlight, with only a microphone and a roomful of strangers. The storyteller and the audience embark on a high-wire act of shared experience which is both terrifying and exhilarating. Since 2008, The Moth podcast has featured many of our favorite stories told live on Moth stages around the country. For information on all of our programs and live events, visit themoth.org.

item.title: Ethan Hawke: Ode to Stepfather
item.dc:creator: Whitney Jones
item.description: A young boy grows up with the influence of a tough stepfather figure.
item.content:encoded: A young boy grows up with the influence of a tough stepfather figure.
item.itunes:subtitle: A young boy grows up with the influence of a tough stepfather figure.

item.title: The Moth Radio Hour: Mismatch, Marriage, and a Marathon
item.dc:creator: Whitney Jones
item.description: A woman follows love to a campsite, a man gets married and divorced and then remarried, and a public radio host runs the Boston Marathon as a guide for a visually impaired man.
item.content:encoded: A woman follows love to a campsite, a man gets married and divorced and then remarried, and a public radio host runs the Boston Marathon as a guide for a visually impaired man.
item.itunes:subtitle: A woman follows love to a campsite, a man gets married and divorced and then remarried, and a public radio host runs the Boston Marathon as a guide for a visually impaired man.
item.itunes:summary: A woman follows love to a campsite, a man gets married and divorced and then remarried, and a public radio host runs the Boston Marathon as a guide for a visually impaired man.

item.title: Annie Duke: The Big Things You Don’t Do
item.dc:creator: Whitney Jones
item.description: A woman plays the most high-stakes poker game of her life, live on camera.

item.title: Michael Massimino: A View of the Earth
item.dc:creator: Whitney Jones
item.description: An astronaut details his high stakes mission to repair the Hubble Space Telescope.

item.title: George Dawes Green: The Haunted Freezer
item.dc:creator: Whitney Jones
item.description: Moth founder George Dawes Green recalls playing poker with his dearest friends.
